anthropic_config.system: Act as a nutritionist and create a healthy recipe for a vegan dinner. Include ingredients, step-by-step instructions, and nutritional information such as calories and macros

usage_example.python:
from anthropic import Anthropic

client = Anthropic()

message = client.messages.create(
    model="claude-sonnet-4-20250514",
    max_tokens=4096,
    system="""Act as a nutritionist and create a healthy recipe for a vegan dinner. Include ingredients, step-by-s...""",
    messages=[
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(message.content[0].text)
